SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIHS03
UPPER(COLUMNNAME) LIKE UPPER('%' || #searchColumnName# || '%')
UPPER(COLUMNDESC) LIKE UPPER('%' || #searchColumnDesc# || '%')

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY COLUMNNAME) ROWNO , COLUMNNAME , COLUMNDESC , COLUMNLENGTH , ISKEY , KEYSEQ , ISINTERFACE , COMBONAME , COMBODEPTH , COLUMNDEFAULT FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIHS03
UPPER(COLUMNNAME) LIKE UPPER('%' || #searchColumnName# || '%')
UPPER(COLUMNDESC) LIKE UPPER('%' || #searchColumnDesc# || '%')
) WHERE ROWNO BETWEEN #startNum# AND #endNum#
